tweet.text: George Pratt Shultz served as President Reagan’s Secretary of State from 1982 to 1989. This week, we will highlight the great influence the 60th Secretary of State exerted in shaping U.S. foreign policy. https://t.co/1k8yvqBHM5 https://t.co/Oz5pgveL6c
